sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Moves data from sn_roadmap_plng_roadmap_src_tbl_mapping to sn_roadmap_plng_roadmap_src_tbl_metadata for pm_project and dmn_demand</description> <name>Move src_tbl_mapping to metadata ppm</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[new RoadmapMetadataUpgrade().updateDataForTables(['pm_project','dmn_demand','pm_program']);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-07-04 18:50:05</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a4eeb74b730130105660ef6bcaf6a7f9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Move src_tbl_mapping to metadata ppm</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">6668cd48c76a1010bb74670f6ec260de</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">6668cd48c76a1010bb74670f6ec260de</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a4eeb74b730130105660ef6bcaf6a7f9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-07-04 22:29:48</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
